job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pAt Parafin our mission is to grow small businesses Small businesses are the backbone of our economy yet banks do not have their back Parafin is a technology company that builds infrastructure which enables small businesses to get easy access to financial services via platforms they sell onppbrppParafins first product offers capitalasaservice for online platforms Parafin currently powers the capital programs of platforms ranging from Series B to post IPO companies We are a tight knit team of engineers and designers coming from organizations such as Robinhood Affirm CapitalOne Uber and CERN excited both about helping hundreds of thousands of small businesses grow and thrive and building products that leaders at top companies have started to use every day We are backed by prominent venture capitalists such as Ribbit Capital Thrive Capital Index Ventures Green Oaks Capital and SV AngelppbrppData science is central to Parafins success  we use unique and wellstructured data from small businesses to build models that directly generate at scale the products we provide to those businesses Parafin offers data scientists the exciting opportunity to combine high impact technical work with career growth while experiencing the multifaceted learning that abounds at a vibrant early stage startupppbrppstrongAbout your rolestrongppbrpulliYou will take unstructured business problems and turn them into data science problems through analysis metric development and modelingliliYou will make efficient timely use of data to guide product and business decisionsliliYou will define and conduct experiments impacting core product design and pricing decisionsliliYou will define and implement a framework for evaluating the performance of our portfolio of credit products that will enable us to grow to the next level of scaleliliYou will analyze conversion on our product and identify first order product improvementsliliYou will apply machine learning to improve our underwriting and pricing strategyliliYou will help scale the Parafin team by hiring exceptional talentliulpbrppstrongAbout youstrongppbrpulliYou are an effective generalist who partners well with engineering product and business functionsliliYou communicate very well with both technical and nontechnical partnersliliYou have a strong grasp of statistics and the fundamentals of machine learningliliYou care deeply about the quality and correctness of your workliliYou take initiative and can own and drive large projects independentlyliliYou are comfortable managing competing and shifting prioritiesliliYou are excited about working on a small team and setting the foundations for data science at ParafinliliYou have two years of work experience as a data scientistliliYou are experienced with Python or RliliYou have a bachelors degree in statistics engineering math computer science or a related technical disciplineliulpbrppstrongPreferred but not requiredstrongppstrongspan classqlcursorspanstrongpulliExperience with credit risk modelingliliExperience with time seriesliliExperience with SQLliliGraduate degreeliulpbrppDont see a role that fits your interests If youre passionate about working at Parafin email us at workparafincom and tell us how youd like to helpp
